text: Emi? Visvasula hrdayalu allah prastavanato krngipoyi, ayana avatarimpa jesina satyaniki vidheyulayye samayam inka raleda? Purva grantha prajallaga varu kuda maripokudadu. Endukante cala kalam gadici poyinanduku vari hrdayalu kathinamai poyayi. Mariyu varilo cala mandi avidheyulu (phasikhun) unnaru
